item.title: Item recoulouring
item.dc:creator: @dark_rebal dark rebal
item.description:
@dark_rebal wrote:

In your class8.java search for

if(i == 6570)

you should see somethin like this

if(i == 6570) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 9631; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 400; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 2047; class8.anInt169 = -8; class8.anInt194 = 12; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Fire Cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A cape of fire.".getBytes(); }

under the last } add that code you have…

○○○Dark Rebal○○○
